quotes.quote: Accomplishing the impossible means only the boss will add it to your regular duties.
The best executive is the one who has sense enough to pick good men to do what he wants done, and self-restraint to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
If you think your teacher is tough, wait until you get a boss. He doesn't have tenure.
Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
Every boss started as a worker.
The boss inspires fear; the leader inspires enthusiasm.
In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
Boss may be on, but leader can be anyone.
He isn't a real boss until he has trained subordinates to shoulder most of his responsibilities

A good boss realizes that they can also learn from those they work with no matter the level, title or position. Learning is a continuous habit and is one of the best lessons demonstrated by a good boss.
No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
Be a leader with a ladder, not a boss with an order.
The way to find the real boss is to find out who hires the lawyers
The secret of successful managing is to keep the five guys who hate you away from the four guys who haven't made up their minds.
The only time some people work like a horse is when the boss rides them.
The speed of the boss is the speed of the team.
A good manager is a man who isn't worried about his own career but rather the careers of those who work for him.
There is a difference between being a leader and being a boss. Both are based on authority. A boss demands blind obedience; a leader earns his authority through understanding and trust.
Don't blame the boss. He has enough problems.
Being a boss anywhere is lonely. Being a female boss in a world of mostly men is especially so.
Learn to obey before you command.
It is always a great honor to be the driver of your own car, to be the boss of your own fate!
Unless you accept anyone to be your boss, no man can be your boss!
The three "C's"of leadership are Consideration,Caring,and Courtesy.Be polite to everyone.
Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
In most cases being a good boss means hiring talented people and then getting out of their way.
There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily; even if you had no title or position.
A good leader is a person who takes a little more than his share of the blame and a little less than his share of the credit.
Remember the difference between a boss and a leader; a boss says "Go!" - a leader says "Let's go!"
By working eight hours a day, you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
A boss says â€œgo and make sure you do itâ€; a leader says â€œlet's go and make it happenâ€. Bosses control people; leaders involve them.
You'll never make a fortune working for the boss man
The person who knows how will always have job. The person who knows WHY will always be his boss.
A leader leads by example, not by force.
People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
Being a leader is making the people you love hate you a little more each day.
A leader is best when people barely know that he exists.
A good boss is a person who can tolerate my complaints and still manage to say hello to me every day.
No great manager or leader ever fell from heaven; it's learned, not inherited.
A boss creates fear, a leader confidence. A boss fixes blame; a leader corrects mistakes. A boss knows all; a leader asks questions. A boss makes work drudgery; a leader makes it interesting.
One of the true tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
Your real boss is the one who walks around under your hat.
The worst mistake a boss can make is not to say 'well done'.
It's always better to deliver the news yourself rather than allow your boss to be surprised.
Most bosses know instinctively that their power depends more on employee's compliance than on threats or sanctions.
Leaders are influential because they live and inspire other people's future.
Every boss, if you are forgetting, is another human being made of bones and flesh and likes it when his ego gets stroked.
Leaders need to be optimists. Their vision is beyond the present.
A good boss makes his men realize they have more ability than they think they have so that they consistently do better work than they thought they could.
The person who knows how will always have a job. The person who knows why will always be his boss.
The first thing the secretary types is the boss.
No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
Being the boss anywhere is lonely. Being a female boss in a world of mostly men is especially so.
People and organizations don't grow much without delegation and completed staff work because they are confined to the capacities of the boss and reflect both personal strengths and weaknesses.
In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
Accomplishing the impossible means only that the boss will add it to your regular duties.
I've never wanted to be the boss.
I would be a billionaire if I was looking to be a selfish boss. That's not me.
Nobody is my boss.
Ok, boss, I don't mind shuffling, but I won't scratch my head.
My relationship with my body has changed. I used to consider it as a servant who should obey, function, give pleasure. In sickness, you realise that you are not the boss. It is the other way around.
No matter who is watching or paying the paycheck, we are ultimately each our own boss.
To be honest, it makes you a lot better coach when your boss is in the meeting room. You're a lot more driven every day.
Without false modesty, I feel that, when I'm on the stage, I'm the king, the boss of the situation.
There's a lot of sacrifices you have to make to be the boss.
Nothing is as embarrassing as watching your boss do something you assured him couldn't be done.
I'm a hustler. I'm the Boss.
At the end of the day, I'm the biggest boss. I'm self-made.
He isn't a real boss until he has trained subordinates to shoulder most of his responsibilities.
Some days, I get overwhelmed and a bit breathless... I've probably cried at work, but I'm limited with my crying: I'm the boss; I'm not really allowed to cry at work.
Why do I want somebody to tell me what to do, tell me what I'm doing wrong? I want to be the boss.
Being your own boss is much superior to working for the man. Including working for your father.
When I thought I couldn't write recipes, my boss at the time advised, 'Write as you talk.'
In the world there are so many Baby girl, you are that one I deserve that I deserve you I'll do anything that you say, anything cause you the boss
Run how you want, boss Chill how you want, boss Floss how you want, boss Do whatcha like Go rock your chain, boss Pour that champagne
Big boss man Won't you hear me when I call I said big boss man Won't you hear me when I call Well you ain't so big You just tall that's all
You looked so lost What a fool I was You called me manly, so masterful You called me manly, so powerful Was I ever gullible She's the boss.
I woke up feelin like a boss Stepped in some mud wiped it off Took a loan, then a took a loss then took some more now I'm a boss I woke up
To be the boss,it would be so great. Makes you feel,just like your on a date.
My Boss wanted me to dance to his tunes all day; sway instantaneously to the most minuscule of his commands and instructions.
My Boss keeps sporty girls, they say; His belly's big with cheer.
We respected the cook; but the name of a Boss was a blot in our book.
The shearers squint along the board to catch the Boss’s boots;
Run how you want, boss. Chill how you want, boss. Floss how you want, boss. Do whatcha like go rock your chain, boss.
Big boss man. Won't you hear me when I call I said big boss man. Won't you hear me when I call.
When the boss comes callin' they'll put us down. When the boss comes callin' gotta stand your ground.
If you want to be a boss and be treated like a boss, then firing someone is in your boss-size job description.
Your boss is not your friend and if you're the boss, your employees aren't your friends.
One member of your network deserves special attention: your boss.
First, the boss plays conflicting roles: supporter and evaluator, which can create confusion.
As an exceptional performer, your probably had minimal interaction with your boss.
The boss is not only a potential source of great help, in both your job and your career, but also the one who evaluates your performance.
Your boss depends on you and needs your commitment and support to succeed.
Don't assume you can make significant differences in how your boss thinks or operates.
